TITLE Vanilla Roasted Strawberries

# Preheat oven to 400F
# Melt [4 tbl butter] into the bottom of a 8x8 pan
# Mix in caviar of [1 item vanilla bean] and add pod
# Roll [24 item strawberries] in the mixture and arrange in pan
# Sprinkle berries with [2 tbl brown sugar]
# Bake for 10 minutes or until berries are soft. Cool slightly.
# Transfer juices into a small pan. Add [2 tbl white balsamic vinegar] and [3 tbl red wine]. Bring to a simmer.
# Remove from heat and mount with [1 tbl butter]
